item.title: The Value of Ethics as a Driver of Business Transformation
item.description: Ethical considerations arising from business transformation often go unnoticed by transformational leaders, let alone by the ICT industry and other stakeholders who should pay close attention to this key driver of transformation. As elusive as it often seems, ethical behavior and responsibility in business transformation, as in other complex decision-making environments, play a crucial role in helping organizations achieve their business goals and establish a solid foundation on which to build a fluid transformation flow.
